description: While this is toggled, your joints will periodically flex, exercising you mildly to generate power passively. Not as powerful as the Metabolic Interchange, but still quite useful.
Your feet have been surgically removed and replaced with armored boots with pop-out motorized wheels, allowing you to move faster across all terrains while draining power.
Concealed in your left arm is a railgun designed to fire ball bearings and electromagnetic projectiles. Activate the bionic to fire and reload it.

Your arms have been replaced with highly modular mechanical equivalents capable of extending outwards to smack your foes with steel fists at the ends. They can't do much else from that distance, though.
Concealed in your left arm is a submachine gun designed to use a variety of handgun ammunition types. Activate the bionic to fire and reload it.

Your hands have been replaced with a mechanical equivalent similar to modern prosthetics, but these particular cybernetics can merge together to create two large drills each, capable of tunneling through rock and soil easily.
Concealed in your left arm is a repeating pneumatic crossbow able to fire bolts and arrows alike, used by extreme hunter enthusiasts. Activate the bionic to fire and reload it.
